toggles.saveLocalCopy: (Causes each image to be saved to the server storage)
toggles.deleteScreens: (Deletes the image from the channel after processing it)
toggles.welcomeMsg: (Sends a welcome message tagging new members explaining the screenshot system)

numbers.self: Changed using `{prefix}set [setting] [value]`. Must be a number
numbers.timeDelay: (How long to wait before processing the next posted image)
numbers.threshold: (The color level at which all values above will be white and all below with be black. Different for different servers for some reason.)

chars.self: Changed using `{prefix}set [setting] [value]`. Must be a string of characters

ids.self: Changed using `{prefix}set [setting] [value]`. Must be a discord id
ids.level30Role: (The role for successful scans. i.e. level 30+)
ids.modRole: (The mod role intended to be notified when an issue occurs)
